mapper.sql: user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, phone, password, user_type AS userType, sex, weixin_code AS weixinCode, head_portrait AS headPortrait, create_time AS createTime, Lastlogin_time AS LastloginTime
mapper.select: select user_id AS userId from b_user where weixin_code =#{weixinCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_user ( user_id, weixin_code, create_time, Lastlogin_time ) VALUE (#{userId},#{weixinCode},Now(),Now())
mapper.update: update b_user set Lastlogin_time = now() where user_id = #{userId}
update b_user set user_name =#{userName},phone =#{phone},user_type=#{userType},sex=#{sex},head_portrait=#{headPortrait} where user_id = #{userId}
